UNIQUE ID KEY:
tabsheets_module_explanation_Log of the access attempts of the system.
This way you gain some security insight whether your system is possibly under attack or not.
DEFAULT ENGLISH:

TRANSLATION FOREIGN LANGUAGE:
Log of the access attempts of the system.
This way you gain some security insight whether your system is possibly under attack or not.

UNIQUE ID KEY:
tabsheets_module_explanation_Blacklisted and whitelisted IP addresses for logging in.
Whitelisted means that specified IP address is allowed to log in.
Blacklisted means that specified address is NOT allowed to log in.
Blacklisted and whitelisted IP address can contradict.
When this happens BLACKLISTED WILL TAKE PRIORITY over whitelisted IPs for security reasons.
A user might whitelist an IP address, but when that user misbehaves, the system must be able to blacklist the user.
Whether whitelists are enabled depends on the setting bCMSLoginOnlyWhitelistedIPs in config file.
